title.rendered: Dr. Demetrios Zamboglou Relinquishes DRC Expert Role with New Appointment As COO of Credit Financier Invest

content.rendered:
August 12th, 2020, The Financial Commission today announces that Dispute Resolution Committee (DRC) member Dr. Demetrios Zamboglou has joined Middle East based Credit Financier Invest (CFI) in the capacity of Chief Operating Officer (COO). With the new role of COO,  Dr. Zamboglou will relinquish his role as an expert in the DRC.

Dr. Demetrios Zamboglou

At the Financial Commission Demetrios assisted the Dispute Resolution Committee in resolving numerous complaints filed against member brokers and was helpful in providing important free educational materials for traders regarding options trading that are available in our Tips for All section.

Financial Commission COO, Nikolai Isayev commented that: “Demetrios has been a valued colleague in our Committee tasked with investigating and resolving disputes and on many occasions provided valuable insight and opinions in cases involving trading matters. We wish him the best of luck in his new role and continued professional success.”

Dr. Zamboglou brings nearly 15 years of experience to CFI and will join the company’s Management team after working in a variety of fintech companies in operations and C-level positions. Mr. Zamboglou is an FX and CFD veteran with over a decade’s experience in trading, risk management, and operations. He spent the bulk of his career, which dates back to 2005, within the retail industry, having held senior positions at Alpari (UK), ForexClub, ForexTime and also setting up his own FX brokerage zebraFX in 2012 before selling the business in 2015.

About Financial Commission

Founded in 2013, the Financial Commission is a leading independent member-driven external dispute resolution (EDR) organization for international online brokerages, exchanges, and Blockchain firms that participate in global foreign exchange (forex), derivatives, CFD and digital asset markets.
